Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe it's time to discuss the next steps in securing this valuable asset for you. We are offering the product at an exclusive price of $750000, reflecting its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you. We understand that the value of this product may be subjective, but we are confident that our proposal presents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
